text: Hashim Uddin Ahmed is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Mymensingh-8. ==Career== Ahmed was a member of the East Pakistan Assembly in 1957. He was elected to parliament from Mymensingh-8 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1986. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Hashim Uddin Ahmed
